data.name: TIME FOR YOU - CHAPTER PASS (1-4)
data.detailed_description:
Play each chapter of Time For You as they come out in this discounted Chapter Pass!

* This currently contains Chapters 01 and 02. Chapters 03 and 04 will be added as they are released.

Chapter Pass (1-4) Contents:


Vanessa, an old friend who brought you into her home after your family’s disappearance, informs you that her husband David suddenly collapsed and is in a coma. You and David don’t have the greatest relationship, but you go back for Vanessa. When you get there, things feel off. Headaches, visions, and feelings you’ve never had before sporadically hit you like a tonne of bricks. You even begin to question your sanity, as a woman you met that day keeps appearing in front of you, but only can see her. All the while, you begin to somehow just notice that Vanessa is a beautiful woman.


With David still in the hospital, someone needed to take care of his company, ETMI Corp. This left it up to Selena, one of your oldest friends. With all that had been going on, you haven’t seen Selena in the house, and it’s already been a couple of days since she's been home. Selena is presumably at the company working, but why has she not returned? You travel to ETMI Corp to discover that things are not as they seem. Something strange is going on with the people working at ETMI Corp, and you can’t leave till you find out what’s going on, and more importantly, where Selena is. What secrets do ETMI Corp and Selena hold? They might be more devious than you think.


You get a call from your best friend who informs you that he’s in jail, accused of being the thief infamously known as the Technodancer: a devilish individual who’s been robbing companies of its most expensive tech the past few weeks, leaving nothing behind other than a choreographed dance routine on the security cameras….... This leads you on an adventure to find proof of your friend’s innocence. Along the way, you’ll be re-acquainted with your friend Ellie, a rambunctious young woman who does things her own way and doesn’t take no for an answer. Your investigation leads you face to face (well actually the thief wears a mask, so yeah) with the elusive Technodancer. Are you strong enough, smart enough, and even agile enough to catch the Technodancer and save your friend?
*ETA: Spring 2022


Things have been pretty non-stop since you’ve come home, and you could use a break. Vanessa feels the same and organizes a dinner party with you, Selena, Ellie, and her friend Kacey, to occupy her mind. For some reason, Vanessa begins to get nervous each time you’re near, like she’s guilty of something. Selena and Ellie share whispers throughout the night, holding whatever secrets they're discussing, between the two of them. Unbeknownst to anyone else, Kacey had heavily invested in David’s new prototype without even knowing what it was. With David in the hospital, Kacey scours the house looking for the prototype, in hopes of making some money off of it. Curiosity leads you to join the search, but neither of you find what you expected.
*ETA: Fall 2022

Note: It is planned that purchasing this Chapter Pass will give you a discount when purchasing future Chapter Passes (5-9 and 10-12) through a Steam Complete the set bundle in the future.

data.short_description: Time For You - Chapter Pass (1-4) Play Chapters 1-4 of Time For You as they come out in this discounted Chapter Pass! * This currently contains Chapters 01 and 02. Chapters 03 and 04 will be added as they are released.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 216 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 216 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 216 MB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy TIME FOR YOU - CHAPTER PASS (1-4)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only. There is explicit sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious and all characters are 18 and over.

Contains nudity, mature language, vaginal and non-penetrative sexual acts.
